# prx-bg-aurora



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute   | Description                                                              | Type       | Default                             |
| ------------ | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------- | ----------------------------------- |
| `amplitude`  | `amplitude` | Controls the height intensity of the aurora effect.                      | `number`   | `1.0`                               |
| `blend`      | `blend`     | Controls the blending of the aurora effect with the background.          | `number`   | `0.5`                               |
| `colorStops` | --          | An array of three hex colors defining the aurora gradient.               | `string[]` | `['#5227FF', '#7cff67', '#5227FF']` |
| `speed`      | `speed`     | Controls the animation speed. Higher values make the aurora move faster. | `number`   | `1.0`                               |
| `time`       | `time`      | Current time of animation. Use to externally control animation progress. | `number`   | `undefined`                         |
